servinfo.title: Oil Pump Chain and Oil Pump Chain Adjuster Inspection

servinfosub.title: Oil Pump Chain
servinfosub.ptxt: Check oil pump chain for wear or any damage.
If malcondition is found, replace oil pump chain.

servinfosub.title: Oil Pump Chain Adjuster
servinfosub.ptxt: Check oil pump chain adjuster according to the following procedures.

item.ptxt: Check latch (1), teeth (2), plunger (3) or tensioner (4) for crack, wear or any damage.
Check that plunger (3) moves in direction [b] and does not move in direction [a] when latch (1) engages with plunger teeth (2).
Check that plunger (2) moves in direction [b] freely and smoothly when latch (1) is raised up in direction [a].
Check that tensioner (3) moves in direction [c] freely and smoothly.

servinfosub.ptxt: If defective condition is found, replace oil pump chain adjuster.
